DOC.brief_title: A Thorough QT/QTc Study Evaluate Effects Intravenous Infusion Eravacycline ( TP-434 ) Cardiac Repolarization
DOC.detailed_description: Each follow treatment evaluate Day 1 period crossover fashion . The IV eravacycline ( TP-434 ) IV placebo double-blinded . - Treatment A : Eravacycline ( TP-434 ) 1.5 mg/kg administer intravenously 60 minute one placebo oral tablet ; - Treatment B : Placebo ( 0.9 % sodium chloride ) administer intravenously 60 minute one moxifloxacin 400 mg oral tablet ; - Treatment C : Placebo ( 0.9 % sodium chloride ) administer intravenously 60 minute one placebo oral tablet . Subjects randomized treatment sequence accord pre-generated treatment scheme . Subjects receive different treatment 3 period .
